name: LEAVES 2 - The Return
description: NOTICE: Activation key must be used on a valid Steam account, requires internet connection.  ABOUT THE GAME      Mononino and the Treefruities fared well without you - until another disaster scattered the leaves of their home tree. Once more, take on the journey and challenging puzzles along the way.       "LEAVES - The Return" is an artistic exploration and puzzle-adventure filled with real sculptures in a surreal dreamscape. This sequel to "LEAVES - The Journey" is a stand-alone addition and playable without any knowledge of the first part.       Collect and combine, solve a plethora of puzzles and mini games that will challenge your wit and skill.        The Stony Mountains are as welcoming as ever, if the Treefruities were not in trouble. Holding on to the leaves of their home tree once again proves to be more difficult than you would think and so the calamity ensues: A gust of wind scatters the leaves all across the lands of Mononino.        Help the Treefruities to get their lost leaves back and look forward to this amazing journey. Explore the fantastic new landscapes added to Mononino where strange creatures and secrets are still waiting to be discovered.
